title: appConfig.getResolvedBranding
summary: Returns the resolved branding for a tenant/app/environment. - **Type**: operation (query) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **Tags**: branding - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/contracts.ts` Expose hydrated branding assets for rendering UI/email experiences.

title: appConfig.lifecycle.createDraft
summary: Creates a new draft tenant config version. - **Type**: operation (command) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **Tags**: app-config - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/lifecycle-contracts.ts` Allow operators to start editing a new tenant config version.

title: appConfig.lifecycle.getVersion
summary: Fetches a single tenant config version by id. - **Type**: operation (query) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **Tags**: app-config - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/lifecycle-contracts.ts` Allow detail drill-down for lifecycle entries.

title: appConfig.lifecycle.listVersions
summary: Lists all versions of a tenant configuration. - **Type**: operation (query) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **Tags**: app-config - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/lifecycle-contracts.ts` Support lifecycle views and change audit tooling.

title: appConfig.lifecycle.promoteToPreview
summary: Promotes a draft tenant config to preview/testing state. - **Type**: operation (command) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **Tags**: app-config - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/lifecycle-contracts.ts`

title: appConfig.lifecycle.publish
summary: Publishes a preview tenant config to production. - **Type**: operation (command) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **Tags**: app-config - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/lifecycle-contracts.ts` Promote tested configurations to production safely.

title: appConfig.lifecycle.rollback
summary: Rolls back to a previously published tenant config version. - **Type**: operation (command) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **Tags**: app-config - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/lifecycle-contracts.ts`

title: appConfig.resolveMessage
summary: Resolves a translation key for a tenant in the requested locale. - **Type**: operation (query) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/contracts.ts` Expose a server-side API for resolving message keys on demand.

title: appConfig.updateBlueprintTranslationCatalog
summary: Registers or updates translation entries for a blueprint. - **Type**: operation (command) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/contracts.ts` Keep blueprint translation catalogs in sync with shipped copy.

title: appConfig.updateTenantBranding
summary: Applies tenant branding overrides (names, assets, domains). - **Type**: operation (command) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **Tags**: branding - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/contracts.ts` Maintain tenant-specific branding assets and domains.

title: appConfig.updateTenantTranslations
summary: Applies tenant-specific translation entries. - **Type**: operation (command) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/contracts.ts` Allow tenants to override selected message keys.

title: appConfig.verifyCustomDomain
summary: Validates DNS ownership for tenant custom domains. - **Type**: operation (command) - **Version**: 1.0.0 - **Tags**: branding - **File**: `packages/libs/contracts/src/app-config/contracts.ts` Confirm tenant-provided domains before activation.
